abstract.t: The Mobile Mesh Border Discovery Protocol (MMBDP) enables a mobileadhoc network to utilize a fixed/wired network for dissemination ofrouting information and for forwarding of data. MMBDP is one protocolin a set of related Mobile Mesh protocols that also includes theMobile Mesh Link Discovery Protocol (MMLDP) and the Mobile MeshRouting Protocol (MMRP). Together, these protocols provide aflexible, extensible mobile adhoc networking capability.
